Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.0001
URINAL_01 = 1 URINAL_02 = 2 URINAL_03 = 3 URINAL_04 = 4 URINAL_04_FOR_BATH_STALL = 5
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Urinal Type 2 ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
urinalHeight = 0.665 urinalBotHeight = 0.32 urinalTopHeight = urinalHeight - urinalBotHeight
urinalWidth = 0.4 urinalDepth = 0.305
urinal2Height = 0.665 - 0.04 urinal2BotHeight = 0.32 - 0.02 urinal2Width = urinalWidth - 0.02
drainElev = 0.03 - 0.135 * 1.8
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Show MEP Connections ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
isavailable = 0 isInArchiCAD = APPLICATION_QUERY ("MEPMODELER", "IsAvailable()", isavailable) isMEPEnabled = (isavailable OR isInArchiCAD = 0) if isMEPEnabled then bShowMEP = 1 reqBMep = 0 success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("LibraryGlobals13", "showMepConnect", reqBMep) if success > 0 then bShowMEP = reqBMep endif else bShowMEP = 0 endif
Symbol.Script_VL:
![#COMPATIBILITY] - START if DirEffluent_ID = -1 then bDefaultElem = (GLOB_INTGUID = "" | GLOB_INTGUID = "{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000}") if bDefaultElem then DirEffluent_ID = 1 else DirEffluent_ID = 2 endif parameters DirEffluent_ID = DirEffluent_ID endif ![#COMPATIBILITY] - END
call "FM_types" parameters all
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Symbol Types ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
dim stSymbolTypes[2] stSymbolTypes[1] = `Тип 1` stSymbolTypes[2] = `Тип 2`
values "gs_symbol_type" stSymbolTypes values "iSymbolType" 1, 2 if not(gs_symbol_type_enable) then gs_symbol_type = stSymbolTypes[2] iSymbolType = 2 parameters iSymbolType = iSymbolType parameters gs_symbol_type = gs_symbol_type
hideparameter "gs_symbol_type" lock "gs_symbol_type" else if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_symbol_type" then iSymbolType = 1 if gs_symbol_type = stSymbolTypes[2] then iSymbolType = 2 parameters iSymbolType = iSymbolType else gs_symbol_type = stSymbolTypes[1] if iSymbolType = 2 then gs_symbol_type = stSymbolTypes[2] parameters gs_symbol_type = gs_symbol_type endif endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Default Sizes ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- values "A" range[0.20, ] values "B" range[0.20, ] if urinalType = 2 then values "ZZYZX" range[0.40, ] else values "ZZYZX" range[0.20, ] endif
if urinalType = URINAL_01 then if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_symbol_type" then if iSymbolType = 1 then A = 0.320 B = 0.330 endif if iSymbolType = 2 then A = 0.330 B = 0.330 endif parameters A = A, B = B endif endif if urinalType = URINAL_02 then if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_symbol_type" then if iSymbolType = 1 then A = 0.320 B = 0.330 endif if iSymbolType = 2 then A = 0.406 B = 0.406 endif parameters A = A, B = B endif endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "urinalType" | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "iStyle" | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "stStyle" then a = defaultSizes[urinalType][1] b = defaultSizes[urinalType][2] zzyzx = defaultSizes[urinalType][3] h_stand = defaultSizes[urinalType][4] parameters A = A, B = B, ZZYZX = ZZYZX, h_stand = h_stand endif
if urinalType = URINAL_01 then if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "halfA" then parameters a = halfA * 2 else parameters halfA = a / 2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "frontHeightFromBottom" then parameters zzyzx = frontHeightFromBottom / (1 - 0.41145) else parameters frontHeightFromBottom = (1 - 0.41145) * zzyzx endif endif if urinalType = URINAL_04 or urinalType = URINAL_04_FOR_BATH_STALL then if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "halfA" then parameters a = halfA * 2 else parameters halfA = a / 2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "frontHeightFromBottom" then parameters zzyzx = frontHeightFromBottom / 0.226 * urinalHeight else parameters frontHeightFromBottom = 0.226 * zzyzx / urinalHeight endif endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "urinalType" | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "iStyle" then ConPosX_1 = defaultConnectionPos[iStyle][1] ConPosY_1 = defaultConnectionPos[iStyle][2] ConPosZ_1 = defaultConnectionPos[iStyle][3] ConPosX_2 = defaultConnectionPos[iStyle][4] ConPosY_2 = defaultConnectionPos[iStyle][5] ConPosZ_2 = defaultConnectionPos[iStyle][6] parameters ConPosX_1 = ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1 = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1 = ConPosZ_1 parameters ConPosX_2 = ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2 = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2 endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! 3D detlevel ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if urinalType = URINAL_01 | urinalType = URINAL_02 | urinalType = URINAL_03 then values "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Упрощенный`,`Откл.` values "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 3, 0 endif if urinalType = URINAL_04 or urinalType = URINAL_04_FOR_BATH_STALL then values "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` values "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed if gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 if gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 if gs_detlevel_3D = `Упрощенный` then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 3 parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m else gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 3 then gs_detlevel_3D = `Упрощенный` parameters gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! 2D detlevel ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
call "2dDetailLevel" parameters all enable2dDetLevels = 2 + 4 + 8 + 16
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Limitations ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
for i = 1 to 255 put i next i
values "gs_cont_pen" use(NSP) values "gs_fill_pen" get(NSP) values "gs_resol" range [4,64]
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = 3 then lock "gs_resol"
if urinalType <> 1 then hideparameter "DirEffluent" if urinalType <> 3 then hideparameter "D"
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Minimal Space ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if MSFront < 0 then MSFront = 0 parameters MSFront = MSFront endif if MSSide < 0 then MSSide = 0 parameters MSSide = MSSide endif if MSSide2 < 0 then MSSide2 = 0 parameters MSSide2 = MSSide2 endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! modify to Shaft ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if urinalType = URINAL_03 then
if isMEPEnabled then
if NOT(ConStatus_1) AND NOT(ConStatus_2) then lock "gs_con_mat" hideparameter "gs_con_mat" endif
dim shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
parameters MEP_NumberConnections = 2
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Подключение Воды`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
if ConWidth_1 < 0.001 then ConWidth_1 = 0.001 parameters ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 endif if ConWidth_1 > 0.032 then ConWidth_1 = 0.032 parameters ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 endif values "ConWidth_1" range (0, 0.032] parameters ConDepth_1 = ConWidth_1 values "ConLength_1" range [0, ]
parameters ConPosX_1 = 0 parameters ConPosY_1 = 0 parameters ConPosZ_1 = 0.155
call "MEP_m_ConnectionsACL_4" parameters SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1+h_stand+0.622, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
parameters MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) parameters MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName parameters MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Подключение Канализации`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
if ConWidth_2 < 0.001 then ConWidth_2 = 0.001 parameters ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 endif if ConWidth_2 > MIN(A/2, B/2) then ConWidth_2 = MIN(A/2, B/2) parameters ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 endif values "ConWidth_2" range (0, MIN(A/2, B/2)] parameters ConDepth_2 = ConWidth_2 values "ConLength_2" range [0, ]
parameters ConPosX_2 = 0 values "ConPosY_2" range [-B+ConWidth_2/2, -ConWidth_2/2] parameters ConPosZ_2 = -zzyzx
call "MEP_m_ConnectionsACL_4" parameters SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2+h_stand+0.622, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
parameters MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) parameters MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName parameters MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
if gs_ui_current_page = 3 then ac_mep_connectionpage_active = 1 else ac_mep_connectionpage_active = 0 endif parameters ac_mep_connectionpage_active = ac_mep_connectionpage_active
if SetProgram then SetProgram = 0 parameters SetProgram = SetProgram endif else hideparameter "gs_connection", "gs_con_mat", "useSysMat"
ac_mep_connectionpage_active = 0 parameters ac_mep_connectionpage_active = ac_mep_connectionpage_active endif
endif
if urinalType = URINAL_02 then
if urinalType = URINAL_02 then ConPosX_2 = 0 parameters ConPosX_2 = ConPosX_2 ConPosY_2 = -B+0.236*(B/0.40) parameters ConPosY_2 = ConPosY_2 endif
if isMEPEnabled then
if NOT(ConStatus_1) AND NOT(ConStatus_2) then lock "gs_con_mat" hideparameter "gs_con_mat" endif

ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = 1 ConWVecZ = 0
if ConWidth_1 < 0.001 then ConWidth_1 = 0.001 parameters ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 endif if ConWidth_1 > MIN(A/2, 0.10*(B/0.40)) then ConWidth_1 = MIN(A/2, 0.10*(B/0.40)) parameters ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 endif values "ConWidth_1" range (0, MIN(A/2, 0.10*(B/0.40))] parameters ConDepth_1 = ConWidth_1 values "ConLength_1" range [0, ]
parameters ConPosX_1 = 0 values "ConPosY_1" range [-B+0.30*(B/0.40)+ConWidth_1/2, -ConWidth_1/2] parameters ConPosZ_1 = 0
call "MEP_m_ConnectionsACL_4" parameters SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1+h_stand+0.5794*zzyzx, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1

! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Подключение Канализации`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
if ConWidth_2 < 0.001 then ConWidth_2 = 0.001 parameters ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 endif if ConWidth_2 > 0.05*(MIN(A/0.40, B/0.40)) then ConWidth_2 = 0.05*(MIN(A/0.40, B/0.40)) parameters ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 endif values "ConWidth_2" range (0, 0.05*(MIN(A/0.40, B/0.40))] parameters ConDepth_2 = ConWidth_2 values "ConLength_2" range [0, ]

ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1

if SetProgram then SetProgram = 0 parameters SetProgram = SetProgram endif else hideparameter "gs_connection", "gs_con_mat", "useSysMat"
ac_mep_connectionpage_active = 0 parameters ac_mep_connectionpage_active = ac_mep_connectionpage_active endif
endif
if urinalType = URINAL_01 | urinalType = URINAL_04 then
if NOT(ConStatus_1) AND NOT(ConStatus_2) then lock "gs_con_mat" hideparameter "gs_con_mat" endif
if urinalType = URINAL_01 then dim DirEffluentValues[2] DirEffluentValues[1]=`Прямой` DirEffluentValues[2]=`В Пол`
values "DirEffluent" DirEffluentValues values "DirEffluent_ID" 1, 2
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "DirEffluent" then if DirEffluent = DirEffluentValues[1] then DirEffluent_ID = 1 if DirEffluent = DirEffluentValues[2] then DirEffluent_ID = 2
parameters DirEffluent_ID = DirEffluent_ID else DirEffluent = DirEffluentValues[DirEffluent_ID] parameters DirEffluent = DirEffluent endif endif
! --- start of modify to Shaft
if isMEPEnabled then

! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
parameters MEP_NumberConnections = 2
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Подключение Воды`
if urinalType = URINAL_01 then ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = 1 ConWVecZ = 0 endif
if urinalType = URINAL_04 then ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = -1 endif
if ConWidth_1 < 0.001 then ConWidth_1 = 0.001 parameters ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 endif if ConWidth_1 > 0.03*(MIN(A/0.295968, B/0.317685)) then ConWidth_1 = 0.03*(MIN(A/0.295968, B/0.317685)) parameters ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 endif values "ConWidth_1" range (0, 0.03*(MIN(A/0.295968, B/0.317685))] parameters ConDepth_1 = ConWidth_1 values "ConLength_1" range [0, ]
if urinalType = URINAL_01 then parameters ConPosX_1 = 0 parameters ConPosY_1 = -B+0.2422*(B/0.317685) parameters ConPosZ_1 = -0.02*(zzyzx/0.53136) endif
if urinalType = URINAL_04 then parameters ConPosX_1 = 0 parameters ConPosY_1 = 0 if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "urinalType" then parameters ConPosZ_1 = 0 endif values "ConPosZ_1" range [0.1 * zzyzx / urinalHeight -zzyzx + ConWidth_1 / 2, 0.1 * zzyzx / urinalHeight - ConWidth_1 / 2] endif
call "MEP_m_ConnectionsACL_4" parameters SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,

ac_mep_connectionpage_active = 0 parameters ac_mep_connectionpage_active = ac_mep_connectionpage_active endif
endif
call "ui_tabcontrol" parameters controlType = 1, gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page
call "ui_plumbingfixtures" parameters iObjectType = 80 * (urinalType = URINAL_01 | urinalType = URINAL_02) + 82 * (urinalType = URINAL_03) + 83 * (urinalType = URINAL_04), gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page
ac_bottomlevel = h_stand+(0.41145*zzyzx)*(urinalType = URINAL_01)+(0.5794*zzyzx)*(urinalType = URINAL_02)+(0.8748*zzyzx)*(urinalType = URINAL_03) + (-frontHeightFromBottom + zzyzx) *(urinalType = URINAL_04 or urinalType = URINAL_04_FOR_BATH_STALL) - zzyzx parameters ac_bottomlevel = ac_bottomlevel parameters ac_toplevel = h_stand + (0.8748*zzyzx) * (urinalType = URINAL_03)
end
Symbol.Script_UI: if urinalType <> URINAL_04_FOR_BATH_STALL then call "ui_plumbingfixtures" parameters all iObjectType = 80 * (urinalType = URINAL_01 | urinalType = URINAL_02) + 82 * (urinalType = URINAL_03) + 83 * (urinalType = URINAL_04), lock_conn_param = (NOT(ConStatus_1) AND NOT(ConStatus_2)) endif
